title: Mother's Day French Toast Brunch Recipe
description: Cook mom this French toast recipe for Mother's Day from Sam the Cooking Guy. It is easy to make and so delicious that your mom will be so impressed with your cooking skills.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText: Cook mom this French toast recipe for Mother's Day from Sam the Cooking Guy. It is easy to make and so delicious that your mom will be so impressed with your cooking skills.

transcripts: When it comes to a special event like mother's day, I always say instead of going out to eat cook for the one you love. And if you don't cook a lot, that idea might stress you out. That's why I'm here with a delicious and simple stuffed French toast. Slice a French loaf about an inch and a half thick. Then use a knife to make a pocket in the middle. Stuff it with softened cream cheese and raspberry jam. Okay so while I'm using raspberry jam feel free to use whatever you like. Though I gotta say raspberry jam really is the way to go. Beat eggs in a bowl, and add a little milk and sugar. Dip both sides of the stuffed bread into the egg mixture and cook in a buttered, non-stick surface until golden brown on both sides. Remove, cut in half, sprinkle with powdered sugar and serve. And if you can't make it for your mom, find a mom to make it for, she will be do appreciative.
